description:
Another special short skit-filled episode and this time the challenge is to do 22 skits in 15 minutes! Or, if that proves impossible, maybe 22 skits in 30 minutes? Starring the Keroro Platoon, the Hinata family, and guest-stars galore!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: This Time is Gero Gero 15 Minutes / Giroro, Show Me
こんどはゲロゲロ15分 であります / ギロロ 見せてくれ! であります
